Here's how to front-run everyone else’s product, content and paid media strategy using Reddit + search signals.

This workflow:
- Scans Reddit for patterns: complaints, “AI for X”, etc.
- Prioritizes threads by engagement
- Maps those themes to 30/14/7 day search data
- Picks keywords/phrases with spiking volume, low CPC 
- Generates SEO content and a paid ads strategy.
- Optionally, agent starts running ads before CPC curve rises. 

Net: a set of early, legitimate opportunities you can move on

I dug into @Talus_Labs and it feels like more than "AI + prediction markets"  it's building the plumbing for autonomous economic agents on-chain

AvA = competitive arena where agent logic is the product (public strategies beat closed hedge secrecy)
SentientAGI integration = distribution at scale (3M+ users pipeline)
Pieverse = gasless, compliant payments (agents become mini onchain businesses issuing receipts)

Tried Talus Vision on Sui testnet this week  drew a simple flow (check price → swap → log outcome), hit deploy, and watched Nexus run each step with verifiable state. Felt less like magic and more like on-chain automation that actually remembers what it did

What stuck with me
• stateful agents that don’t reset between steps
• Talus Tools making offchain calls auditable onchain
• a Leader network that handles retries and fault tolerance instead of failing silently

Humorous: A tool that prevents you from starting yet another startup (to curb idea overload).

I’ve been secretly building a new startup. I can't hold it in anymore...

Replit, Bolt etc made it easier than ever to build your startup.

But most people are still guessing what to build.

Wrong idea. Wrong positioning. No growth model. This fixes that.

I've wanted software like this for 15 years because it solves the biggest problem in entrepreneurship right now.

It’s a tool for uncovering ideas with clear demand, smart positioning, and built-in distribution.

I’m rolling it out slowly:

1)

If you’re struggling to get startup ideas; try this method:

• Think of areas where you’re above average (vs other entrepreneurs)

• Write commonly held beliefs in those areas

• Write your differentiated / contrarian beliefs in the same areas

• Think of what’s become possible or necessary lately (tech or behavior wise)

• From all this, write multiple pain-solution hypothesis with evidence of time or money spent (so you solve rich problems)

• Shortlist those ideas where you can create 10x eff

most people create digital products backwards and wonder why nobody buys

they make the product first, then try to find customers

I use the "reverse engineering" method instead

here's the full 25-step system:

PHASE 1: MINING YOUR AUDIENCE (Steps 1-7)

1. Post about your niche for 14 days straight without selling anything. just value.

2. Screenshot every single DM you receive asking "how do I do X?" - this is gold.

3. Save every comment that says "can you explain this more?" - these are prod

this is a killer idea for a few reasons.

most marketplace failures stem from one thing: arbitrary, trustless transactions. dating apps today optimize for top of funnel gimmicks… e.g. new swipes, new prompts, new filters but the underlying dynamics stay broken.

what actually matters is mutual trust & skin in the game. if you behave badly, there should be something to lose. social penalties is roughly how every society functions.

people act differently when they know someone’s watching.

Scrape every police auction site in the country. Cars, electronics, tools – all seized assets auctioned off at state, county, or city level. But the interfaces are archaic, the listings inconsistent, and no one’s aggregating it.
